author: powercode
body:
Feature request:

Add attributes that can control the completion of files and directories.

```powershell
param(
    [FileCompleter("*.txt", Depth=2)] # Default Depth=1, 
    [string[]] $Path,
    [DirectoryCompleter()] # with optional wildcard name
    [string] $OutDirectory
)
```

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Those would be handy. There is a public api to help with the first: `System.Management.Automation.CompletionCompleters.CompleteFilename`.

title: Add FileCompleterAttribute and DirectoryCompleterAttribute
